attributes.action: halt the planned destruction of the existing borough market
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Borough market is over 250 years old and is a part of life for Londoners. Celebrated by top chefs and by Londoners alike, the market is unique in the World's Capital City. Fresh and organic, farm fresh produce sustains London's local and tourist population throughout the year. The proposed viaduct by Network Rail will seriously compromise the pleasant environment in which the market has thrived. There are alternative rail links which will suffice but Network Rail will not tolerate because of the additional cost.
